watt.name: WATT (WhatsApp Automated Texting Tool)
watt.description: Desktop tool that automates WhatsApp messages using Puppeteer and ElectronJS.
features: Simulated human typing with randomized delays...
Implemented JSON-based message templates...
Frontend optimization using useMemo, useCallback...
Drafted a microservice scaling plan with Docker, Kubernetes, NAS hosting...

leetcodeRepo.description: Collaborative TypeScript repo using Strategy Pattern.
features: Scalable structure for strategies...
Solutions for common algorithmic problems...
Focus on code modularity and collaboration.

nextjsDashboard.description: Dashboard App exploring SEO, SSR, CSR with Pages Router.

reduxSocialMedia.name: Redux Social Media App
reduxSocialMedia.description: Redux toolkit-based app with mock services and custom hooks.

dtbGuard.name: DTB-Guard â€“ IoV Vehicle Management and Security
dtbGuard.description: Final-year MERN + React Native system to manage and track vehicles with a deception-based (honeypot) digital twin security architecture for Internet of Vehicles (IoV).
features: Real-time telemetry streaming via WebSocket for alerts and status
Digital Twin replica and deception engine to lure and study attackers
Admin web dashboard (MERN) for monitoring, alerts, and metrics
React Native mobile app for vehicle tracking and management
Monitoring and event logging with <2s data sync latency
Scalable multi-core server design; reduced false positives via decoys (diverted ~85% simulated intrusions)

reduxDocsTutorial.name: Redux Toolkit Docs Walkthrough
reduxDocsTutorial.description: Self-directed implementation following official Redux Toolkit documentation: slices, async flows, RTK Query.
features: Configured store with slices, selectors, and typed middleware
Implemented async thunks and normalized state patterns
Adopted RTK Query for data fetching, caching and invalidation
TypeScript-first setup for actions, reducers, and selectors

nextjsDocsTutorial.name: Next.js Docs Learning Project
nextjsDocsTutorial.description: Tutorial-driven exploration of Next.js: routing, data fetching (SSR/SSG/ISR), API routes, and SEO.
features: File-based routing with dynamic routes and layouts
Server-side rendering, static generation, and incremental regeneration
API routes and middleware basics
Image optimization and metadata for SEO
